<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set / clear using of night vision during cutscenes. This command only works with [[camCreate]] created camera that is currently the main camera for the player (see example).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''camUseNVG''' set

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> set: [[Boolean]] enable/disable night vision

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[camUseNVG]] [[true]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[setDate]] [2000,12,31,0,0];
_cam = "camera" [[camCreate]] [0,0,0];
_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]];
_cam [[camSetRelPos]] [0,-5,3];
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["Internal","Back"];
_cam [[camCommit]] 0;
[[camUseNVG]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setCamUseTI]], [[disableTIEquipment]]
</value></part></template>
